text: Yadi timīharū phaisalā cāhanchau bhanē tyō phaisalā timrō sāmu maujūdacha, ra yadi yasabāṭa panchinachau bhanē yō sāhrai rāmrō cha, ra yadi timīlē phēri tyahī kāma garnēchau bhanē hāmīlē pani phēri tyahī kāma garnēchauṁ, ra timrō jat'thā timrō kunai kāma lāgnēchaina, cāhē jati nai adhika kina nahōs, ra satya kurō yō cha ki allāha īmānavālāharūkō sāthamā cha
